attributes.action: Stop free education to illegal immigrants children's
attributes.additional_details: Many people living in UK and working illegally without paying tax. Children of these people easy get free state education. When child spend five to seven year in UK then they can apply for settlement on behalf of children under human right. If department stop free education to illegal immigrants children they can save money and stop these people staying illegally in UK. Before giving space to children in state school they should check their parents immigration status. One parent must have legal right to stay here before child start free state school.
